a fictitious substance called "red mercury" that, according to local lore, can be found in the throats of ancient mummies. Some people think it has magical powers and can be used to summon spirits. They live thinking about it. They could kill each other to get it, Zahi Hawass said. "When I enter any place in Egypt, people ask me all the time about this."
